articles.title: Bruins reportedly in ‘driver’s seat’ in trade talks for Rasmus Andersson
articles.description:
"I believe they are the only team that has been given permission to talk to Andersson."

The post Bruins reportedly in ‘driver’s seat’ in trade talks for Rasmus Andersson appeared first on Boston.com.
